channel.title: Programming on Henry King's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Henry King's Blog

item.title: Github
item.description: Github基本操作 apt install git 添加ssh 增加repositories 设置 git config -l git config user.name J_mailbox git config user.email J_mailbox@163.com //配置本地 git remote add origin https://github.com/CongliYin/CSS.git 如果出现错误：fatal: remote origin already exists，则执行以下语句： git remote rm origin git push origin master git add . git commit -m "all" git push
